question: 1) Which tag is used to link an external JavaScript file in HTML?
2) What is the default position of elements in CSS?
3) Which property is used in CSS to change the background color of an element?
4) What does the <meta> tag provide in HTML?
options: a) Defines metadata about an HTML document
answer: a) Defines metadata about an HTML document

question: 5) Which JavaScript method is used to convert a JSON string into a JavaScript object?
6) What is the primary purpose of the <form> tag in HTML?
7) Which CSS property is used to control the space between lines of text?
8) What does the async attribute in the <script> tag do?
options: a) Loads the script after the page is fully loaded
b) Loads the script while parsing the HTML
c) Loads the script only if needed
answer: b) Loads the script while parsing the HTML

question: 9) Which HTML element is used to define navigation links?
10) Which protocol is used to securely transfer data between a browser and a server?
